data.caption: Outcome Of The Board Meeting
data.news_body:
The Board of Directors at its meeting held on May 18, 2023 has inter-alia approved the Audited financial results of the Company for the quarter and financial year ended March 31, 2023.

The 45th Annual General Meeting of the members of the Company will be held through video conferencing (VC)/ other audio-visual means (OAVM) on Thursday, August 31, 2023.

data.caption: Audited Financial Results For The Quarter And Financial Year Ended March 31, 2021
data.news_body: The Board of Directors of Gland Pharma Limited (the 'Company') at its Meeting held today, i.e. Monday, May 17, 2021 has inter-alia considered and approved Audited financial results (standalone and consolidated) for the quarter and financial year ended March 31, 2021
